title: Don't move
lyrics:
Eonjengabuteo him-e gyeowojil ttaemada
Nun-e nunmul-i maejhil ttaemada
Nan neoleul tteoollyeo
Gakkeumssig
Neoleul ij-eoboneun geon eotteolkka

Geuleon saeng-gagdo haebojiman nan

Yeogsi neowa hamkke iss-eul ttaega

Joh-a



Umjig-iji ma

Nae gyeot-e meomulleojwo

Dol-aboji ma

Neul naman balabwa jwo

Naui i salm-eul

Modeun sigan-eul

Jeonbu neolo gadeug chaewojwo



Eonjengabuteo nan mucheog-ina heundeullyeo

Jakku neoleul wonmanghage doego

Tto neol miwohage dwae



Gakkeumssig

Neoleul jiwoboneun geon eotteolkka

Geuleon saeng-gagdo haebojiman nan

Yeogsi neowa hamkke iss-eul ttaega

Joh-a



Umjig-iji ma

Nae gyeot-e meomulleojwo

Dol-aboji ma

Neul naman balabwa jwo

Naui i salm-eul modeun sigan-eul

Jeonbu neolo gadeug chaewojwo



Sesang moduga

Nal biusgo oemyeonhaedo

Haneul-i modu

Muneojyeo naelindaedo

Neon neul nae gyeot-e hangsang naui yeop-e

I du son-eul kkog jab-ajwo



Neoleul cheoeum mannan nal-eul gieoghae

Sesang kkeut-e beolyeojin na-ege

Ttatteushan songil-eul geonnejudeon neoleul ajigdo

Nan gieoghae



Umjig-iji ma

Nae gyeot-e meomulleojwo

Dol-aboji ma

Neul naman balabwa jwo

Naui i salm-eul modeun sigan-eul

Jeonbu neolo gadeug chaewojwo



Sesang moduga

Nal biusgo oemyeonhaedo

Haneul-i modu

Muneojyeo naelindaedo

Neon neul nae gyeot-e hangsang naui yeop-e

I du son-eul kkog jab-ajwo



Nae son-eul jab-ajwo



I want you to be always by my side
